nodes.text: Roasted Kowakian monkey-lizards were served as a dish on the volcanic planet of Nevarro. They were prepared by roasting a dead Kowakian monkey-lizard on a spit, and were edible by humans.
Roasted Kowakian monkey-lizards first appeared in Chapter 1 of the 2019 Disney+ television series The Mandalorian, which aired on November 12, 2019.
